Reviews.Title: A freaking mazing camera!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Which ever way you decide to take pictures, either point and shoot or get creative and go-to manual will produce awesome photos. I bought this camera for the birth of my first child and to have for her childhood years, I would of paid more for this item if i had to of! The battery last long enough in my opinion and the video is to die for. Being able to transfer photos to a smart device real time is a wonderful feature, Upload to Facebook or YouTube strut from the camera is also a great feature. Two thumbs up for me and my family! Yet another great product from Samsung
